transArray.content: The facilities are new and very clean. The service is very good and the breakfast is delicious. I will take the initiative to ask.

Dear guests: Hello! Thank you very much for your support and trust in us. We will continue to uphold the service concept of doing things with heart and serving attentively, so that you can feel the warmth of home when you stay at Orange Hotel. We look forward to your coming again to review our progress, and wish you a happy day!
